title: Furnished 2Queen BD Studio
posting_body: WALTHAM - STUDIO - FULLY FURNISHED WITH ALL NEW FURNITURE ------ Check out this newly done over apartment building, formerly a hotel.

Fully furnished including a desk (all furnishings are new), most units have a queen sized sleep sofa, ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED EVEN WIFI, off-street parking, 24 hour maintenance, 24 hour gym access, business center, and coin-op laundry on-site.
Every room comes with a fully kitchen stocked including coffee pot and toaster, and linens.
Plenty of closet space with an upgraded bathroom.
It’s a must see with river views and a half of mile from downtown Moody Street with all the shops and restaurants.
First, Last : Landlord pays Broker Fee
